name: Veles Labyrinth

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Knights. First one in one of the Hive rooms, second one in the hallway before the main area, and third one on the upstairs platform.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Unstoppable Ogre, across the gap in the main area.

modifiers.name: Fire Pit
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Acolytes spawn fire pools that cause damage over time.

notes: You have to shoot three runes in the first section in order to progress to the main room. There are a number of spawns in the boss area before the boss appears.

name: Exodus Garden 2A

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Overload Captains.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitors

modifiers.name: Scorched Earth
modifiers.desc: Enemies throw grenades significantly more often.

notes: Boss is a big floating Servitor. You can melt it and skip the ads in the final room.

name: Aphelion’s Rest

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Appear on far away platforms, and often move behind cover.

burnDesc: Taken Acolytes and Boss have Stasis weapons that slow and freeze you.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Taken Acolytes all have Void shields.

modifiers.name: Epitaph
modifiers.desc: Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

notes: Taken Psions duplicate frequently and quickly. Lots of Stasis AOE damage in the boss area.

name: Bay of Drowned Wishes

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: One outside of the cave barrier, and one on the far platform in the boss room.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Last champion spawns when you get closer to the cave barrier. Each spawn is accompanied by many Screebs.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: One Scorn Raider on a far away platform.

modifiers.name: Raider Shield
modifiers.desc: Scorn Raiders now have Void shields.

notes: Lots of Screebs. Boss room ads seem to spawn infinitely. Ads will jump up onto the platform where you enter.

name: Chamber of Starlight

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: On far away platform and can be sniped at.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Taken Acolytes all have Void shields. Wizard Boss has Void shield.

modifiers.name: Epitaph
modifiers.desc: Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

notes: Lots of Taken Acolytes and Thrall.

name: K1 Revelation

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Ogres that spawn at the three crystals.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Knights. The last one will spawn alongside the boss.

modifiers.name: Fire Pit
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Acolytes spawn fire pools that cause damage over time.

notes: There's one Shrieker in the distance. Destroy the floating crystals to advance to the boss fight. Many ads still spawn after you defeat the boss, so getting to the chest without killing them is challenging.

name: K1 Communion

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen captains.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitors. Final Barrier Servitor doesn't spawn in the boss room if you kill the boss fast enough.

modifiers.name: Arach-NO!
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Fallen Vandals spawn a web mine at their feet.

notes: Boss appears after you kill the ads and Heavy Shank. You can prevent the third Barrier Servitor and a wave of Exploder Shanks from spawning if you kill the boss fast enough.

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen Captains.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitors. Last Barrier Servitor spawns when the boss is at 50% health.

name: K1 Logistics

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Fallen Captains.

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Servitors.

shields.name: Arc
shields.desc: Fallen Captains have Arc shields. There's one in the first area and a few in the boss area.

notes: Servitor boss teleports twice at each 3rd of its health, starting from middle → left → right.

name: Metamorphosis

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Scorn Chieftains. Two in the first room, one in the second. They throw lots of totems.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: One in the second room, another in the boss room.

modifiers.name: Scorched Earth
modifiers.desc: Enemies throw grenades significantly more often.

notes: Destroy the three crystals at the end of each room to take down the enemy's immune shield.

name: Sepulcher

champions.name: Barrier
champions.desc: Barrier Knights. One in the first room, one in the hallway after the first room, and one in the boss room. The second one can run to the next room; recommended to kill it quickly before it does.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Unstoppable Ogre in the second room.

shields.name: Solar
shields.desc: Solar Wizard in the first room.

modifiers.name: Fire Pit
modifiers.desc: When defeated, Acolytes spawn fire pools that cause damage over time.

notes: Two Hive Guardians: one in the first room, and another in the second.

name: Extraction

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Scorn Chieftain in the first room.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Unstoppable Ogre. One in the plates room, and one in the boss room.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Scorn Raiders in the first room.

modifiers.name: Raider Shield
modifiers.desc: Scorn Raiders now have Void shields.

notes: Many ads spawn during the plate capturing. Final boss is a Hive Guardian wizard.
